Children that attend a school that offers free meals to all students (Community Eligibility Provision or Provision 2) are also eligible.

The online application for P-EBT is now open. Please review the criteria to see if you need to apply to receive these benefits. The application link is provided below.

Dear Parents,
As you know, we are in the peak of flu season. I urge you to be diligent with hand washing and disinfecting all hard surfaces in your homes. If your child has complaints of headache, fever, body aches, they need to be seen as soon as possible to be tested for Influenza B and be started on therapy as soon as possible.
I also want to ask that if your child is running fever, please do not medicate them and send them to school. They need to be seen by a physician first to rule out any contagious illnesses. If you have any questions or concerns, please, do not hesitate to call my office to discuss.

Jean Hubert, RN
361-296-3101#6
